songs.title: Rock And Roll
songs.lyrics:
You' re dressed in black leather
You' re my kind of girl
Cause you die to live
And you' ll live to die

Rock and roll, rock and roll
Rock and roll, rock and roll

Come on, come on
Come on, come on to me...

Make love to me
Make time with me
Get, get, get it on with me

Hey baby won' t you give me some
Gotta get semeone who can be alone
Rock and roll...
